AffymetrixCntReaderModel Reads Affymetrix .CNT files generated by the Chromosome Copy Number Analysis Tool (CNAT).
AffymetrixCntReaderModel.DataSetIdentifier Singleton class creating new database identifiers for each data set.
ChromosomeSplitter  
CommonFileFilter Easy standard file filter.
CopyNumberMerger Merges an array of ICopyNumberModels
CopyNumberRecord Represents a copy number
CopyNumberRegionFilter Returns a new CopyNumberDataModel with a reduced number of copy numbers.
CopyNumberTransformer Transforms a AffymetrixCntReadModel into an ICopyNumberDataModel via thresholding and filtering techniques.
DataSlot A DataSlot encapsulates one or more ICopyNumberModel datasets with all configurations.

Locus A genomic locus: chromosome and start and stop basepairs.

MemoryGenomicMarkerModel  
SimpleCopyNumberFilter Filters copy numbers such that only losses/gains/both or all markers are shown.

Enum Summary
AffymetrixCntReaderModel.Fields  
AffymetrixCntReaderModel.FileVersion  
SimpleCopyNumberFilter.Type Filter Type LOSS return only losses GAIN return only gains BOTH return losses and gains ALL return all markers (unfiltered)
